personalInfo.name: Prasad Deshpande
personalInfo.title: Passionate for Solving Problems, Technology and Gen AI
aboutMe: I bring over 17 years of experience in Software Product Development, with a strong focus on building reliable and resilient enterprise systems that drive business value. I currently lead the design and development of a modern Quote-to-Cash (QTC) Architecture

I played a key role in leading the Siemens Partner App Ecosystem initiative, where I was instrumental in partner onboarding and streamlining Application Developement. I'm passionate about delivering customer-centric solutions, driving operational excellence, and aligning technical execution with strategic business objectives. I work closely with stakeholders across functions to ensure transparency, alignment, and measurable outcomes.
